casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 13, 2011

[Cite as 04/13/2011 Case Announcements #2, 2011-Ohio-1787.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1430. PNH v. Alfa Laval Flow, Inc.

Mahoning App. No. 09 MA 41, 2010-Ohio-3280. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Mahoning County.

Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for continuance of oral argument scheduled for Tuesday, April 19, 2011, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and oral argument is rescheduled for Wednesday, May 25, 2011.
